backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage and authorization mixins plus types and comparison modules for users, slots, gigs, transactions, ROI data, and analytics events.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for all major frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color variables, theme modes, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, admin routing, and role‑based dashboards with usage tracking.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an admin‑only access denied message with a go‑back button.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCale: Musician availability manager allowing creation and toggling of time slots with UI sorting and mutations.
frontend/src/components/BookingDialog.ts: Venue booking modal that submits gig details and creates a confirmed gig for a musician.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with branding, user avatar, admin link, and logout handling using identity and profile queries.
frontend/src/components/MusicianSearch.t: Provides a searchable list of musicians with filtering, profile previews, and booking callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a profile creation form that saves user details and selected role, validating inputs and integrating with Internet Identity.
Opens a dialog to scan QR codes for gig verification, triggering attendance checks and handling scanning states.
frontend/src/components/QRTicketGenerato: Generates downloadable QR-like tickets for gigs using a custom canvas-based pattern generator.
frontend/src/components/WalletView.tsx: Shows wallet earnings across locked, available, and paid balances with a summary and breakdown cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, gigs, musicians, analytics, and usage events through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsageTracking.ts: Tracks session, page views, and actions for authenticated users by recording usage events once per session.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, theming for light and dark modes, and base typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard displaying analytics summaries and recent usage events with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboard.tsx: Customer dashboard showing user-specific data and searchable, upcoming gig listings with a styled UI.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, gig search, and login actions by role with filtering for upcoming gigs.
frontend/src/pages/MusicianDashboard.tsx: Musician dashboard displaying profile info, stats, upcoming gigs, wallet data, and availability management.
frontend/src/pages/VenueDashboard.tsx: Venue dashboard showing venue stats, gig lists, musician search, booking flow, and QR scanning.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and plugins for typography, containers, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app features, issues, and analytics/admin dashboard requirements.
